series at 1-1. Game 3 of the best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana." I'm going to remember this game for a long time," said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists. I've been playing a lot off my God-given ability. This game took a lot of thinking. I'm pleased with my mental aspect coming into the game... When guys doubled me, I found my teammates and they hit the shots. I don't think I forced too many things. Aaron McKie had 19 points and George Lynch added 16 for Philadelphia, which finished as the top team in the East for the first time since 1983-84.
